text: Troy Mills is an unincorporated community in Adair County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Troy Mills was established in 1868, and remained in operation until 1879. The community took its name from a nearby woolen mill. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adair County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Troy Mills, Missouri
